org.wildfly.security.ssl

Class ConfiguredSSLSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Socket
      • javax.net.ssl.SSLSocket
        • org.wildfly.security.ssl.AbstractDelegatingSSLSocket
          • org.wildfly.security.ssl.ConfiguredSSLSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    final class ConfiguredSSLSocket
extends AbstractDelegatingSSLSocket
    An SSL socket which is pre-configured.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
